questions.question: Which famous museum in Europe houses the painting 'Girl with a Pearl Earring', also known for its historic 17th-century architecture?
questions.context: This museum in the Netherlands is renowned for its collection of Dutch Golden Age paintings.

questions.question: Where can you visit an architectural marvel that is the tallest building in the world since 2010, located in Asia's United Arab Emirates?
questions.context: This skyscraper stands at a height of 828 meters and has become an icon of modern engineering.

questions.question: Name the ancient ruined city that was buried in AD 79 by a catastrophic volcanic eruption, now a popular archaeological site in Europe.
questions.context: This site provides a snapshot of Roman life and is located near the notorious Mount Vesuvius.

questions.question: Which UNESCO World Heritage site in Africa is recognized for its stunning sandstone cliff formations and prehistoric rock art?
questions.context: Home to the Dogon people, this area is as significant for its cultural traditions as its unique geology.

questions.question: Identify the world wonder marking the Great Pyramid, a structure of antiquity and lasting fame on the continent of Africa.
questions.context: The last surviving of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, it exemplifies ancient Egyptian architectural prowess and alignment with celestial bodies.
